channel.title: BUG MoarFactory 0.9.1
channel.description:
updated midgame to MF 0.9.1 and added MF Resources - all preexisting built items are visible, but can not build new one. i have no tab in the buildmenu.
maybe the milestone is not triggered with the new version? how can i reset the milestone to unlock it again?
thanks

item.title: BUG MoarFactory 0.9.1
item.dc:creator: @Manuel_A meRlinX_AT
item.description:
@Manuel_A wrote:

a second restart of the game made it.

solved

Read full topic
